metadata.title: CVE-2022-33972 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect calculation in microcode keying mechanism for some 3rd GenerationIntel(R) Xeon(R) Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user topotentially enable information disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-33972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
